author: Staff Reporter
text:
The battle of brains is all set to begin with the pre-event of the 16th edition of The Hindu Young World Quiz 2016 presented by VIT University on February 25. To be held at the Anna Adarsh College for Women, the event will be conducted for two categories —Juniors and Seniors — for which registrations begin at 9.30 a.m. and 1 p.m. respectively.

Students from Classes 4 to 6 can register for the Juniors category and students from classes 7 to 9 can register for the seniors category.

For more details, those interested can log on towww.thehindu.com/ywq2015or contact Sheerambal at 9445605485.
title: Young World contest on February 25
